name: api_ui_GUISkin
description: Defines how GUI looks and behaves.

properties.name: box
properties.description: Style used by default for GUI.Box controls.

properties.name: button
properties.description: Style used by default for GUI.Button controls.

properties.name: customStyles
properties.description: Array of GUI styles for specific needs.

properties.name: font
properties.description: The default font to use for all styles.

properties.name: GUISkin
properties.description: Make this the current skin used by the GUI.

properties.name: horizontalScrollbar
properties.description: Style used by default for the background part of GUI.HorizontalScrollbar controls.

properties.name: horizontalScrollbarLeftButton
properties.description: Style used by default for the left button on GUI.HorizontalScrollbar controls.

properties.name: horizontalScrollbarRightButton
properties.description: Style used by default for the right button on GUI.HorizontalScrollbar controls.

properties.name: horizontalScrollbarThumb
properties.description: Style used by default for the thumb that is dragged in GUI.HorizontalScrollbar controls.

properties.name: horizontalSlider
properties.description: Style used by default for the background part of GUI.HorizontalSlider controls.

properties.name: horizontalSliderThumb
properties.description: Style used by default for the thumb that is dragged in GUI.HorizontalSlider controls.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Style used by default for GUI.Label controls.

properties.name: scrollView
properties.description: Style used by default for the background of ScrollView controls (see GUI.BeginScrollView).

properties.name: settings
properties.description: Generic settings for how controls should behave with this skin.

properties.name: textArea
properties.description: Style used by default for GUI.TextArea controls.

properties.name: textField
properties.description: Style used by default for GUI.TextField controls.

properties.name: toggle
properties.description: Style used by default for GUI.Toggle controls.

properties.name: verticalScrollbar
properties.description: Style used by default for the background part of GUI.VerticalScrollbar controls.

properties.name: verticalScrollbarDownButton
properties.description: Style used by default for the down button on GUI.VerticalScrollbar controls.

properties.name: verticalScrollbarThumb
properties.description: Style used by default for the thumb that is dragged in GUI.VerticalScrollbar controls.
